page.title: 01A Day in the life of.
page.content: Reluctantly woken up by hungry children to prepare cereal and toast for breakfast.After the children have left for school,vacuum at 100 miles per hour and dust to save conscience before more enjoyable persuits of coffee and chat with friends.A quick snack of baked beans on toast before rushing off to St.Helens Technical College for rivetting English Literature lesson where I read the part of Duchess in Duchess of Malfi. After Quiche Lorraine and chips for evening meal,a bicycle ride to local park.Following a game of scrabble and bedtime story the youngest child is put to bed and I settle down to study for the remainder of the evening.News at ten keeps me abreast of world events before making packed lunches and supper.A quick tidy-up,shower and bed for 11.30. Mrs Read,Housewife
